name: Stay Home (danylarge)
description:
A cute but anxious girlfriend simulator.

In this COVID-19 pandemic state, this cute girlfriend with anxiety and extreme mood-swing has to be trapped inside her dorm, unable to go back home because of the lockdown.

Help her to go through the day! Give some love and support to get her through this difficult time together.

Programming:
| @danylarge

Art:
| @sarahhana / @hanachiisshi

"Stay: A Cute but Anxious Girlfriend Simulator" is an idle simulation game where you need to help the girl stay healthy and happy during her quarantine days. Order food, play with her cat, and don't forget to work. Most importantly, don't forget to stay hygiene and was her hands often.

FEATURES

  • Cute and adorable art style
  • Calming and relaxing gameplay
  • Options of activities to do for 14 days

Current build is not completed yet. The game is currently in development.
